notesStmt.note: The form as used by CAO sources in the Historia Regum

rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Audi domine hymnum
et orationem et oratione
quam qua servus tuus orat coram te
hodie domine ut sint oculi tui aperti et aures tuae
intentae intende super domum istam die ac nocte

vBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody:
Respice domine
de sanctuario tuo et
silent reading
de excelso caelorum
habitaculo habitaculum
Qui regis Israel intende qui deducis velut ovem Joseph

rep.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
